name: I'm a Zombie
description:
Controls:

 Z attack

Arrow keys are how you move

Space is how to get out a scuffle

Two world superpowers on a the brink of war, one has created a chemical agent that turns humans into living zombies. In this world lives a man named Jacob, Jacob comes home from a long day at work and sits in front of the television the news is going over the threat of war and safe areas if you get affected. Jacob is confused by the word “affected” but is so sleepy he falls asleep in front of the television. The next morning Jacob has changed and has a uncontrollable hunger but he does remember one thing, the safe area this is where your journey begins………...
